name: Canvas Hockey
description:
Canvas Hockey is a top-down, arcade-style party game, whose character animations were made with drone footage of real hockey players. Team up with friends in local multiplayer for 1v1 or 2v2 battles, or set up custom Tournaments for up to 12 players. You can also start a single player Career, where you start at the bottom (Bronze league) and work your way up to the top (CHL elite). Manage your roster by trading your partner and goalie, or if your team is losing, trade yourself! Keep track of all of your stats and team history in this endless Career mode, as the A.I. progressively get faster and more skilled as you move up the leagues! Now, with the Co-Op career mode option, you can grab a friend and have them join you in your career mode games whenever you like.

Canvas Hockey will be supported by adding regular content updates and quality of life improvements. Please reach out with any problems or suggestions, they help to improve the game. Join the Discord Server to get involved with the community and play in tournaments via remote play!
https://discord.gg/b5AN7H2

Canvas Hockey needs to support as many controllers as possible, so if you are using one that's not on the list, or if you are having trouble with a controller you want to use, shoot an email to brandon@synvoyity.com.

Controller Support:
Switch Pro Controller: validated
8BitDo Sn30Pro+: validated
Joy Cons (L/R): validated, movement input is digital
Xbox360/XboxOne: validated by beta testers
PS3/PS4: validated by beta testers, reported issues with universal PS3 + dongle
Steam Controller: validated by beta testers, reported issues with movement inputs
